BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Fireworks.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain additional attacks equal to the number of cards discarded this turn.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ShadowShot.NAME: Shadow Shot
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ShadowShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each card in your hand that isn't a Curse or Status.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ImpishPrank.NAME: Impish Prank
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ImpishPrank.DESCRIPTION: Discard as many cards as you want. NL Gain BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Imp equal to the number of discarded cards.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:SecondDeal.NAME: Second Deal
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:SecondDeal.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL If the discarded card costs 1 or more, return this card to its position.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PartyPistol.NAME: Surprise Pistol
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PartyPistol.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, draw !M! card.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PartyPistol.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, draw !M! cards.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:HiddenPast.NAME: Hidden Past
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:HiddenPast.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Deal !M! damage to a random enemy whenever you draw or create a card in your hand.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DiligentPast.NAME: Diligent Past
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DiligentPast.DESCRIPTION: The first attack card you play each turn is played twice, then your character moves to the back.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:JoyfulPast.NAME: Joyful Past
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:JoyfulPast.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Whenever you discard or Exhaust a card, the front ally gains !M! Block.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DestinyDraw.NAME: Destiny Draw
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DestinyDraw.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Once per turn, when your hand becomes empty, draw !M! card and gain [E] equal to their combined cost.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:DestinyDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Once per turn, when your hand becomes empty, draw !M! card and gain [E] equal to their combined cost.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:AvatarOfFear.NAME: Avatar of Fear
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:AvatarOfFear.DESCRIPTION: BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shared. NL Whenever you apply BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Fear, if the enemy intends to attack, reduce their Strength by the same amount for 1 turn.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Sweep.NAME: Sweep
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Sweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Strength equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Sweep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Strength equal to unblocked damage dealt.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PanicShotRetry.NAME: Panic Shot Retry
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PanicShotRetry.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random 0-cost cards from your discard pile to your hand.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Silencer.NAME: Silencer
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Silencer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each 0-cost card you’ve played this turn.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shift.NAME: Shift
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Shift.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The chosen ally gains !B! Block and moves to the front. NL Exhaust.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:TheGravityofaB.NAME: The Boss’s Gravity
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:TheGravityofaB.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Evil *Deeds (!BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:M2!): Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: /!BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:M2!): Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Lure.NAME: Lure
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Lure.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL The chosen ally moves to the front.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Lure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard 1 card. NL The chosen ally moves to the front.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ImmortalMercen.NAME: Immortal Mercenary
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ImmortalMercen.DESCRIPTION: Summon a BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Mercenary with !M! HP to the front. NL When it dies, add a cost 0 *Immortal *Mercenary to your discard pile.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ShieldOfProble.NAME: Shield of the Problem Solver
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ShieldOfProble.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card remains in your deck at the end of combat, *Haruka gains !M! Max HP.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:ShieldOfProble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL If this card remains in your deck at the end of combat, *Haruka gains !M! Max HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't play NL this card.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PanicBarrage.NAME: Panic Barrage
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:PanicBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Fear equal to unblocked damage dealt.

BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Exit.NAME: EXIT
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Exit.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain X *Shift+. NL Exhaust.
BlueArchive_ProblemSolver:Exit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain X+1 *Shift+. NL Exhaust.
